processing_time.database_access_version: Live web search results from Google on 2025-08-13
processing_time.notes: Initial author integrity check for 'Luz M. López' required careful disambiguation due to another researcher with a similar name having retractions in a different field. Follow-up queries confirmed the author of this paper has no such issues.

study_identification.title: The Effectiveness of a Culturally Sensitive Cognitive Behavioral Group Intervention for Latino Alzheimer's Caregivers

authors.all_authors: Judith G. Gonyea, PhD, Luz M. López, PhD, and Esther H. Velásquez, MSW, MPH

doi.cross_verification: VERIFIED - DOI resolves to the correct article on academic.oup.com and PubMed.
doi.notes: DOI is clearly stated in the source document.

pmid.cross_verification: VERIFIED - PMID links to the same study as the DOI on the PubMed website.
pmid.notes: PMID was not present in the paper itself but was easily discoverable via a web search of the DOI.

registration_numbers.value: Not found after paper and external query
registration_numbers.source: Paper query (Methods section) and external queries (site:clinicaltrials.gov, site:isrctn.com)
registration_numbers.cross_verification: NOT_ATTEMPTED - No identifier found to verify.
registration_numbers.notes: The paper describes a randomized controlled trial but does not mention a registration number. Extensive external searches for the study title 'Circulo de Cuidado' and principal investigator 'Judith G. Gonyea' on clinicaltrials.gov and the general web did not yield a registration number.

retraction_resources.successful: site:pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov, site:crossref.org, site:retractionwatch.com, General web search

expression_resources.tier2_attempted: General web search with keywords 'expression of concern' (ACCESSIBLE)

integrity_resources.tier3_attempted: General web search with author names and 'retraction' or 'misconduct' (ACCESSIBLE)
integrity_resources.author_query_methods: Used full names, last name with first initial, and combinations with institutional affiliation ('Boston University') to disambiguate.

registry_resources.tier3_attempted: General web search with keywords 'trial registration' (ACCESSIBLE)
registry_resources.successful: All sites were accessible but returned no results for this specific study.
registry_resources.query_strategies: Used study title ('Circulo de Cuidado'), principal investigator name ('Judith G. Gonyea'), and institution ('Boston University').

retraction_investigation.findings: No findings found after querying PubMed, CrossRef, Retraction Watch, and the general web.

query_summary.web_searches_performed: ['site:pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov 24855313 retracted', 'site:crossref.org 10.1093/geront/gnu045 retracted', 'site:retractionwatch.com "The Effectiveness of a Culturally Sensitive Cognitive Behavioral Group Intervention"']
query_summary.search_terms_effective: DOI and PMID-based searches were most effective.
query_summary.comprehensive_coverage: YES - Primary retraction databases were checked using specific identifiers.

expression_of_concern_investigation.findings: No findings found after querying PubMed, the publisher's website (Oxford Academic), and the general web.
expression_of_concern_investigation.corrections_found: No corrections or errata were found during the investigation.

query_summary.editorial_systems_investigated: Searches were performed on the journal's public-facing website.

team_integrity_investigation.findings: No evidence of research misconduct, retractions, or expressions of concern were found for any of the listed authors in relation to their work. An initial search for 'Luz M. López' found retractions belonging to a different researcher in an unrelated field, which was resolved through disambiguation.

authors_investigated.name_variants_queried: ['Luz M. López', 'L. López', 'Luz M. Lopez Boston University']
authors_investigated.findings: No concerns found. Initial hits for a researcher with a similar name ('Luz M. Lopez-Marin') in a different scientific field were confirmed to be unrelated to this author, who is at the Boston University School of Social Work.

investigation_details.timeframe_covered: Not applicable, searched entire career history.

integrity_findings.retractions_found: None attributable to the study authors.
integrity_findings.expressions_found: None attributable to the study authors.

query_summary.author_matching_success: High, after disambiguation for one author.

timing_analysis.retrospective_justification: No justification provided as no registration was mentioned.

query_summary.query_methods: ID search (failed), Title search ('Circulo de Cuidado'), PI search ('Judith G. Gonyea')
query_summary.successful_registries: All registries were accessible but yielded no results for this study.

registration_timing_investigation.limitations: The primary limitation is the lack of a public trial registration record. For a randomized controlled trial, this is a significant transparency issue as it prevents independent verification of pre-specified primary outcomes and protocols against the published report.

reliability_metrics.database_consistency: Results were consistent across all queried resources.
reliability_metrics.findings_quality: Strong findings (high confidence in absence of retraction and presence of registration issue).

overall_analysis.major_limitations: The most significant issue identified is the lack of public trial registration for this randomized controlled trial, which impacts transparency and the ability to check for outcome reporting bias.
overall_analysis.methodology_effectiveness: The IDENTIFIER-FIRST approach was highly effective. Discovering the DOI and PMID allowed for precise, high-confidence checks for retractions. The inability to find a registration number through targeted searches was, in itself, a key finding.

metadata.database_access_method: Web search for all external databases - no direct API access
metadata.web_search_strategy: Site-specific searches to avoid rate limiting
metadata.rate_limiting_eliminated: YES - using web_search() instead of direct database APIs
metadata.special_notes: The study mentions approval by the Boston University Institutional Review Board, which is a necessary ethical step but is distinct from public trial registration.
